title: Papers v2.0.2 [K]rack'd
description:
The latest version of this popular software

Official Web SIte:  <a href=" http://www.mekentosj.com/papers/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.mekentosj.com/papers/</a>

Organize your research, all of it.

Papers2 helps you organize over 85 different document types
Papers doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t just want your PDFs, it will gladly organize all your documents, whether they are word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, posters, scanned receipts, and many more. Papers even has a dedicated space for your own articles, and conference related materials, like your travel documents and posters.

Some papers are special.

Easily keep track of your own papers and documents
Your papers deserve their own place in Papers. Keep your own work at your fingertips, anytime. Papers keeps track of your manuscripts as well. As soon as you enter a citation, a manuscript file is added to your Papers library. Upgrading a manuscript to published status moves it from manuscripts into the general library, and into My Papers.

Changes since 2.0

return of the classic dedicated Match view
search engines settings are now accessible through the toggleview
now recognizing correctly last names with von dem particle
author-autocomplete no longer searches for prefixes
import of old-style keynote files now works
citations now adds improved support for scrivener
citations now correctly inserts italicized characters
citations no longer affects non-papers fields
made Endnote temporary citations backwards-compatible with Papers1
added a disable option to the manuscripts menu
added Papers1 upgrade menu item in purchase menu
now detecting when trying to enter a Papers1 serial number
improved spotlight indexing
fixed an author parsing bug
fixed a bug where two authors would be prefixed with "and".
fixed an issue with symlinks
fixed an issue with wrong author and journal counts
fixed various migration issues
fixed a problem with activations if the host name is not set
fixed an issue where resetting matches would not update the inspector
fixed a graphics glitch with the copy machine effect
fixed a memory issue related to large thumbnails
fixed a crash when searching PDFs
fixed opening about manuscripts help
fixed an issue where Endnote labels and URIs were not correctly exported
fixed a number of Endnote XML import issues
fixed an issue restarting the app upon library setting changes
migrations is now correctly terminated before certain maintenance events
where relevant we now migrate the document numbers
added cap on maximum number of generated thumbnails during migration
files are now migrated by default to the Articles subdirectory
the built-in Papers help center now defaults to the knowledge base

If you need help there are tutorials at: <a href=" http://www.mekentosj.com/papers/help15/pgs/gettingstarted.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.mekentosj.com/papers/help15/pgs/gettingstarted.html</a>

System Requirements:

Papers for Mac OS X Intel 10.6 Snow Leopard and above
